chapter.title: Menus, Combo Box, Toolbar Classes
chapter.para: This set of classes provides both fixed and popup menu.

section.title: GTKComboBox
section.para: The GTKComboBox class is a subclass of the GTKWidget class ().
This widget provides a drop down list of menu choices. Once a choice is selected the combo box displays that selection.

section.title: Method: signal_connect
section.para: Connect a signal to an ooRexx method.

section.title: Signals and Methods
section.para: This class can receive signals and events. When a signal or event is received a method of the class is invoked. The name of this method corresponds to the name of the signal or event. By default all of the signals have a method predefined in the class to receive the signal. This method performs no actions by default.
In order for the signals to be processed by the user's code you must subclass this class and override the signal method. You can supply any action you wish to process the signal.

By default, none of the signals for this class are connected so even if you provide an override method the method will not be invoked unless the signal is connected first. To connect a signal you must invoke the signal_connect method and provide the name of the signal to be connected.
This class has the following signals available.
